about.title: Brand Story
about.subtitle: OUR STORY
about.story_text:
Pearl Elegance was born from a love and pursuit of the beauty of pearls.

We believe that every pearl is a work of art created by nature and time. In the gentle seawater, after years of precipitation and sharpening, it finally blooms with a unique warm luster. This gift from the deep sea carries the purest aesthetics of nature.

At the beginning of the brand's establishment, we established the concept of 'selecting nature and conveying elegance'. Our team visited pearl producing areas around the world, from the South Sea in Australia, Ise-Shima in Japan, to Taihu Lake and Zhuji in China, just to find those pearls with perfect luster and pure quality.

In design, we pursue the fusion of the implicitness of Oriental aesthetics and the exquisiteness of Western craftsmanship. Every piece is crafted with ingenuity, which not only retains the natural beauty of the pearl itself, but also gives it a modern design language. We hope that people who wear Pearl Elegance can feel the tranquility and elegance from the deep sea.

Pearl Elegance is not just jewelry, but also an expression of life attitude. We invite you to explore the beauty of pearls and feel the eternal charm of nature's gift.

types.title: Types of Pearls
types.intro: Waters around the world nurture different types of pearls, each with its unique charm and value.

items.name: South Sea Pearl
items.desc: The largest pearl variety, known for its satin luster.

items.name: Akoya Pearl
items.desc: Classic seawater pearl known for perfect roundness and mirror luster.

items.name: Tahitian Pearl
items.desc: The only natural black pearl, with mysterious metallic overtones.

items.name: Freshwater Pearl
items.desc: Diverse shapes and colors, great value for daily wear.

quality.title: Quality Appreciation
quality.intro: Understand criteria to better appreciate the unique beauty of each pearl.

items.name: Luster
items.desc: The most important factor. High quality means sharp, mirror-like reflections.

items.name: Surface
items.desc: Cleanliness of the surface. Tiny natural marks are acceptable.

items.name: Shape
items.desc: Round is rarest, but off-round and baroque have unique charm.

items.name: Size
items.desc: Larger is generally rarer. Choose based on style and preference.

items.name: Color
items.desc: Includes body color and overtones. Choose what matches your skin tone.

items.name: Matching
items.desc: Uniformity in size, color, and luster for strands and pairs.

care.title: Care Guide
care.intro: Pearls are organic gems requiring gentle care.

items.name: Avoid Chemicals
items.desc: Keep away from perfume, makeup, hairspray.

items.name: Avoid Heat/Dryness
items.desc: Don't store in direct sunlight or near heaters.

items.name: Store Separately
items.desc: Use soft pouches to prevent scratching.

items.name: Clean Regularly
items.desc: Wipe with soft cloth after wearing.

items.name: Wear Often
items.desc: Skin oils help keep them hydrated.

items.name: Check Regularly
items.desc: Restring necklaces every 1-2 years.
